Sefety issue with number: 6 - Update Record➛...➛Number was rejected and the state is work in progress aggain.

Hello!

Sefety issue with number: 6 - Update Record➛...➛Number was rejected and the state is work in progress aggain.

Hello!

Safety issue with number: 3➛...➛Number and opened by 3➛...➛First name3➛...➛Last name  was approved and completed.
